Bio Title

Bio pages use a unique header style to display the name and title of the employee.

Portia Kennel, M.S.W.

Senior Vice President, Program Innovation, and Executive Director, Educare Learning Network

<h1>Portia Kennel, M.S.W.</h1>
<p class="large-body-text">Senior Vice President, Program Innovation, and Executive Director, Educare Learning Network</p>
